description:
Adds a new exploration area and World Quests based on the outlying regions of the royal capital, Ashra-am Baird featured in Atelier Ryza 2.

Note: The additional area is not an open field.
In order to play this content, you need to complete the main quest "Riding on the Dragon Vein."
Please visit the official website for more information.
name: Additional Area "Ashra-am Baird Outlying Areas"
